contract_type.explanation: The document is titled '2002 MASTER AGREEMENT' and references the International Swaps and Derivatives Association, Inc. (ISDA), explicitly identifying it as an ISDA Master Agreement.

contract_type_version.explanation: The agreement is explicitly referred to as the '2002 Master Agreement' in both the heading and body text.

contract_date.explanation: The contract is dated as of April 7, 2020, as clearly stated below the title.

amendment_date.explanation: There is no indication that this document is an amendment; it is the initial contract.

amendment_number.explanation: There is no mention of an amendment number, as this is not an amendment.

version_type.explanation: The document is the original 2002 ISDA Master Agreement, not an amendment or restated version.

status.explanation: The agreement is dated and presented as a finalized contract, not a draft. No explicit 'draft' watermark or language is present.

party_name_1.explanation: CITIBANK, N.A. is listed as one of the two parties at the top of the agreement.

party_role_1.explanation: While the document does not explicitly label CITIBANK, N.A. as 'Party A', it is standard practice in ISDA agreements for the first listed party to be Party A.

party_name_2.explanation: ADVANCED ENERGY INDUSTRIES, INC. is listed as the second party at the top of the agreement.

party_role_2.explanation: While the document does not explicitly label ADVANCED ENERGY INDUSTRIES, INC. as 'Party B', it is standard practice in ISDA agreements for the second listed party to be Party B.

document_quality.explanation: The document is clear, well-formatted, and free of typos or OCR errors.
